reviews.text: 1555 Valwood Pkwy Ste 130, Carrollton, TX 75006 Sometimes, the most meaningful moments happen around the dinner table. Earlier this week, Team Dallas had the opportunity to prepare and serve a meal to the incredible families staying at the Ronald McDonald House of Dallas. ❤️💛 We're honored to support a place that feels like home when it's needed most. #AdvocateCares #GiveBack #ronaldmcdonaldhouse

I had an excellent experience with Advocate Construction! They did a phenomenal job working with my insurance company and made the entire process smooth and stress-free. … More Response from the owner a month ago Ravi, it is so great to hear that Noah did such a great job handling your account and that he could help you through the whole roof replacement process. Thank you for the five-star review. - Louie

My co-worker has recommend Advocate Construction as they sent the team to inspect my home. Drake and Luke did great job providing me checklist and the items that needed to replace. Their professionalism is the key factor driving to get … More Response from the owner a month ago Ibrahim, thank you for your positive feedback and recommendation! We're so happy to hear that Drake and Luke were able to provide you with a 5-star experience. We'll be sure to share this review with them and their team.

Great experience with the Advocate Construction team in Houston.  They replaced my roof quickly and professionally.
